Introduction

Welcome to my website! I am an undergrad at UC Davis with a passion for making games in Unity. Below is a collection of projects that I have worked on, ranging from a couple days to a couple months in length. Currently, I have three apps on the App Store, two of them being collaborations with a partner. Most recently, we released a Virtual Reality game called Overboard on Steam! Tap to expand a project and learn more.
